amount.description: The amount of discount. Should always be numeric, even if setting a percentage.

discount_type.description: Determines the type of discount that will be applied.

date_expires.description: The date the coupon expires, in the site's timezone.

date_expires_gmt.description: The date the coupon expires, as GMT.

individual_use.description: If true, the coupon can only be used individually. Other applied coupons will be removed from the cart.

product_ids.description: List of product IDs the coupon can be used on.

excluded_product_ids.description: List of product IDs the coupon cannot be used on.

usage_limit.description: How many times the coupon can be used in total.

usage_limit_per_user.description: How many times the coupon can be used per customer.

limit_usage_to_x_items.description: Max number of items in the cart the coupon can be applied to.

free_shipping.description: If true and if the free shipping method requires a coupon, this coupon will enable free shipping.

product_categories.description: List of category IDs the coupon applies to.

excluded_product_categories.description: List of category IDs the coupon does not apply to.

exclude_sale_items.description: If true, this coupon will not be applied to items that have sale prices.

minimum_amount.description: Minimum order amount that needs to be in the cart before coupon applies.

maximum_amount.description: Maximum order amount allowed when using the coupon.

email_restrictions.description: List of email addresses that can use this coupon.
